I can't reproducde this.  I expect that you have been modifying the pattern in
emf-merge.xml, which normally looks like this:

  (\s*@\s*extends|\s*@\s*implements)(.*?)\n

Probably you meant to start with "(?:"

Probably this is related to the other defect (which causes the emf-merge.xml on
the template path to be used even when dynamic templates are disabled).

Yes, it is related to the other defect. The old emf-merge.xml contained exactly 
the line mentioned in the exception. It was loaded because of bug 84520.
